item.description:
Munjfest – Portland’s Munjoy Hill neighborhood's celebration of summer – will be held on Sunday, July 18 from 11am-4pm, as always on Congress Street at the top of the East End. This year organizers are going all out with a Lovefest for the Bicycle theme for people of all ages and abilities.

Portland Bicycle Commuting Meetup and Portland Green Streets are joining together in the fray! We'll share a table and are looking for volunteers. Of special interest to Meetup members with proven traffic experience (especially LCI's and Traffic Skills 101 graduates!) is a "Bike Safety Q & A Station" – for those burning "What am I Really Supposed to do in This Particular Road Situation??" questions. If you wish to volunteer, sign up for shifts on this Doodle calendar.

Green Streets will be hosting a Stencil-Your-Own Green Streets Shirt. If you'd like to volunteer for this activity, sign up for shifts on this Doodle calendar.

Please contact Green Streets summer intern Michelle Boisvert at greenstreetsvolunteers@yahoo.com for any volunteer information.

Munjfest Bike Events will include:

• Bike Decorating Party
• Grand Bike Parade
• Kids Bike Raffle of 5 reconditioned bikes – a recycling of good bicycles!
• Bike Safety Q & A Station – for those burning “What am I Really Supposed to do in This Particular Road Situation??” questions
• Free Check-Up from a Local Bike Shop
• Print-Your-Own Green Streets T-Shirt Party!
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a table set up on Congress Street.
item.name: MunjFest -- Celebration of the Bicycle
